   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Grand Orrey
============

Small helpers for MRI daily tasks.

First see ``installation`` (tl;dr: `pip install grandorrey`).

The only current tool is ``modelCorr``, a small tool to print correlations within
design files.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   installation
   modelCorr
